name: Beanstalk Breeze
description:
Submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2020!

Summary

In Beanstalk Breeze, you're tasked with climbing a beanstalk that has grown out of control. 

Attempt to climb it and reach the top- but beware! The winds are not in your favor, and the drone you took with you to film your adventures is having a rough time.

Try to collect as much fruit as possible, dodge thorns and stay on the Beanstalk, all while overcoming the mighty breeze that is plaguing this beanstalk!

Controls
  •  Playable using Controller and Keyboard
  • Movement: WASD / Left Joystick
Developed by

Design:

Tim Raaijmakers
Robin Jansen Eyken Sluyters
Okan Tekin

Art:

Marn Schokker
Remco van de Ven
